query.value:
SELECT replace(keyword,'''','''''') AS key1, 
CASE WHEN COALESCE (synonym, '') != '' THEN replace(keyword,'''','''''') ||'||'||replace(synonym,'''','''''')
     ELSE replace(keyword,'''','''''') END AS key2
FROM cd_ods.tb_fc_news_keyword_t
WHERE 1=1
AND seq between @{int(variables('no'))} *3000 - 2999 and @{int(variables('no'))} *3000
ORDER BY key1 , key2
